title: Effective mass of the normal negative-charge carrier in bulk He II.
abstract: The first acceleration measurements are reported for negative ions in bulk superfluid 4He. Data recorded at 70 mK, 25 bars for electric fields in the range 80 < E < 150 V are consistent with an ionic dispersion relation identical to that of a free particle with mass (87 ± 5)m4, where m4 is the 4He atomic mass

        Effective mass of the normal negative-charge carrier in bulk He II.</dc:title><dc:creator>
        Ellis, T.</dc:creator><dc:creator>
        McClintock, Peter V. E.</dc:creator><dc:subject>
        QC Physics</dc:subject><dc:description>
        The first acceleration measurements are reported for negative ions in bulk superfluid 4He. Data recorded at 70 mK, 25 bars for electric fields in the range 80 < E < 150 V are consistent with an ionic dispersion relation identical to that of a free particle with mass (87 ± 5)m4, where m4 is the 4He atomic mass.</dc:description><dc:date>

        Ellis, T. and McClintock, Peter V. E. (1982) Effective mass of the normal negative-charge carrier in bulk He II. Physical Review Letters, 48 (26). pp. 1834-1837. ISSN 1079-7114</dc:identifier><dc:relation>
